name: CHOICES: The Song of Fire and Ice
name_original: CHOICES: The Song of Fire and Ice
description:
“{4 billion years ago, meteorites rained upon mother earth, bringing with them an abundance of minerals, water, and fire. This is that story.}

Comrade, are you ready to lead? 

A planet divided by fire and ice; falling into total destruction as the colonization of the ice nation catapults a war. You must escape the planet on meteorite ships before fire, and before complete obliteration. You are trusted to swerve obstacles, hold diligence, and make executive decisions and choices to save your people from being consumed by flames. 

The story of life as you know it lies on your shoulders. Make good choices, or watch helplessly as they lead you and your people to annihilation.”
